title: How to boot Windows 8 or 8.1 In DOS Mode.pdf
description:
Start Windows 8 - 8.1 DOS mode.

Before Windows 95, most PCs used to boot to DOS by default. While most of the time it led to people typing Ã¢â‚¬Å“WINÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ at the C: prompt to get back to Program Manager, booting to a command line was occasionally handy when things went wrong.

If you run Windows 8 or Windows 8.1, you can still boot into a command prompt without loading the full Windows GUI if things go wrong.

This book will show you step by step with pictures to access DOS mode.
